UPDATE tb_user_data data
data.user_ticket = #{ticket},
data.user_money = #{coin},
data.user_char_list = #{charList},
data.uniq_prod_list = #{uniqProdList},
data.time_ticket_end_date = CASE WHEN data.time_ticket_end_date IS NULL THEN now() + CAST(#{timeTicketRange} AS TIME) ELSE data.time_ticket_end_date + CAST(#{timeTicketRange} AS TIME) END
WHERE data.user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT data.user_no, data.user_money, data.user_ticket, data.user_char_list, data.uniq_prod_list, data.time_ticket_end_date FROM tb_user_data data WHERE data.user_no = #{userNo}
